channel.title: techtips on Kris - The Coding Unicorn
channel.description: Recent content in techtips on Kris - The Coding Unicorn

item.title: Automate .NET target framework update with PowerShell
item.description: With all the active development in the .NET world many of us have faced a situation where we need to update .NET target framework more frequently in order to be able to keep up, but at the same time to be able to utilize all the goodies .NET has to offer.

item.title: Kris's Quick Cup of K8s #1
item.description: #1 - Live streaming of Pod logs #2 - Get non-existent Namespace without erros #3 - Get all resources in a Namespace #4 - Retrieve and clean up Evicted Pods Starting a totally new Tech Tips subsection feels great - especially when it's going to be purely dedicated to Kubernetes utilizing Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) for demo purposes!

item.title: Power of --query in Azure CLI
item.description: Have you ever heard of or used query parameter when running Azure CLI commands? If not, I do recommend you checking it out because this is a pretty powerful parameter that can help you with much faster and efficient data retrieval and filtering! Let's use DNS records retrieval as an example: I need to update DNS records pointing to a specific IP, f.
